---
title: "Publications"
format: html
resources:
  - data/published-papers.yml
---

<div class="pub-search-controls">
<label for="pub-search-input"><strong>Search publications</strong></label><br>
<input id="pub-search-input" type="search" placeholder="Type title, author, journal, year, or link">
<span id="pub-search-status" aria-live="polite"></span>
<span id="pub-count-summary" aria-live="polite"></span>
</div>

<style>
.pub-search-controls {
  margin: 1rem 0 1.25rem;
}

#pub-search-input {
  min-width: 18rem;
  max-width: 36rem;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0.35rem 0.5rem 0 0;
  padding: 0.45rem 0.55rem;
}

#pub-search-status {
  display: block;
  margin-top: 0.4rem;
  margin-left: 0;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  color: #444;
}

#pub-count-summary {
  display: block;
  margin-top: 0.35rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  color: #444;
}

#published-journal-list ul {
  margin-top: 0.25rem;
}
</style>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/js-yaml@4.1.0/dist/js-yaml.min.js"></script>
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  var input = document.getElementById("pub-search-input");
  var status = document.getElementById("pub-search-status");
  var countSummary = document.getElementById("pub-count-summary");
  var listContainer = document.getElementById("published-journal-list");
  var staticSections = Array.prototype.slice.call(
    document.querySelectorAll("details.published-papers-search-static")
  );

  if (!input || !status || !countSummary || !listContainer) {
    return;
  }

  var allPapers = [];
  var staticEntries = staticSections.map(function (section) {
    return {
      section: section,
      key: section.getAttribute("data-count-key"),
      entries: Array.prototype.slice.call(section.querySelectorAll("ol > li"))
    };
  });
  var staticCounts = {};
  staticEntries.forEach(function (item) {
    staticCounts[item.key] = item.entries.length;
  });
  var initialSectionOpen = {};
  staticEntries.forEach(function (item) {
    initialSectionOpen[item.key] = item.section.open;
  });

  // Ensure reversed lists display in descending order.
  Array.prototype.slice.call(
    document.querySelectorAll(".reversed-list > ol, [class*='reversed-list-'] > ol")
  ).forEach(function (ol) {
    ol.setAttribute("reversed", "");
  });

  function normalized(text) {
    return (text || "").toLowerCase().trim();
  }

  function escapeHtml(value) {
    return String(value || "")
      .replace(/&/g, "&amp;")
      .replace(/</g, "&lt;")
      .replace(/>/g, "&gt;")
      .replace(/\"/g, "&quot;")
      .replace(/'/g, "&#39;");
  }

  function formatAuthors(authors, equalCoauthors) {
    var equalLookup = (equalCoauthors || []).map(function (name) {
      return normalized(name);
    });
    var items = (authors || []).map(function (name) {
      var cleanName = String(name || "");
      var markedName = escapeHtml(cleanName) +
        (equalLookup.indexOf(normalized(cleanName)) !== -1 ? "+" : "");
      return normalized(cleanName).indexOf("jae yeon kim") !== -1
        ? "<strong>" + markedName + "</strong>"
        : markedName;
    });
    if (items.length <= 1) {
      return items[0] || "";
    }
    if (items.length === 2) {
      return items[0] + " and " + items[1];
    }
    return items.slice(0, -1).join(", ") + ", and " + items[items.length - 1];
  }

  function buildPaperMarkup(paper) {
    var links = (paper.links || []).map(function (item) {
      return '[<a href="' + escapeHtml(item.url) + '">' + escapeHtml(item.label) + "</a>]";
    }).join(" ");
    var equalNote = (paper.equal_coauthors || []).length > 0 ? " (+ = co-lead authors.)" : "";
    var note = paper.note ? "<ul><li>" + escapeHtml(paper.note) + "</li></ul>" : "";
    return '<li><p><a href="' + escapeHtml(paper.url) + '">"' + escapeHtml(paper.title) + '"</a> (' +
      formatAuthors(paper.authors, paper.equal_coauthors) + ") <em>" + escapeHtml(paper.venue) + "</em>, " +
      escapeHtml(paper.citation) + equalNote + (links ? " " + links : "") + "</p>" + note + "</li>";
  }

  function renderList(items) {
    if (!items.length) {
      listContainer.innerHTML = "<p>No matching papers found.</p>";
      return;
    }
    var html = '<ol start="' + items.length + '" reversed type="1">';
    items.forEach(function (paper) {
      html += buildPaperMarkup(paper);
    });
    html += "</ol>";
    listContainer.innerHTML = html;
  }

  function entryMatches(entry, query) {
    if (query.length === 0) {
      return true;
    }
    var text = normalized(entry.textContent);
    var links = Array.prototype.slice
      .call(entry.querySelectorAll("a"))
      .map(function (a) {
        return a.getAttribute("href") || "";
      })
      .join(" ");
    return text.indexOf(query) !== -1 || normalized(links).indexOf(query) !== -1;
  }

  function runStaticFilter(query) {
    var matchCount = 0;
    staticEntries.forEach(function (item) {
      var sectionMatches = 0;
      item.entries.forEach(function (entry) {
        var isMatch = entryMatches(entry, query);
        entry.style.display = isMatch ? "" : "none";
        if (isMatch) {
          sectionMatches += 1;
          matchCount += 1;
        }
      });
      if (query.length > 0) {
        item.section.open = sectionMatches > 0;
      } else if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(initialSectionOpen, item.key)) {
        item.section.open = initialSectionOpen[item.key];
      }
    });
    return matchCount;
  }

  function updateCountSummary() {
    var underReviewCount = staticCounts.under_review || 0;
    var workingPapersCount = staticCounts.working_papers || 0;
    var pipelineCount = underReviewCount + workingPapersCount;
    countSummary.innerHTML =
      "Published papers: " + allPapers.length +
      " | Proceedings: " + (staticCounts.proceedings || 0) +
      " | Book chapters: " + (staticCounts.book_chapters || 0) +
      " | Media and public writing: " + (staticCounts.media_public_writing || 0) +
      "<br>Pipeline: " + pipelineCount +
      " (Under review: " + underReviewCount +
      ", Working papers: " + workingPapersCount + ")";
  }

  function runFilter() {
    var query = normalized(input.value);

    var matches = allPapers.filter(function (paper) {
      var blob = normalized([
        paper.title,
        (paper.authors || []).join(" "),
        paper.venue,
        paper.citation,
        paper.year,
        (paper.links || []).map(function (item) { return item.label + " " + item.url; }).join(" ")
      ].join(" "));
      return query.length === 0 || blob.indexOf(query) !== -1;
    });
    var staticMatchCount = runStaticFilter(query);
    var totalSearchable = allPapers.length +
      (staticCounts.under_review || 0) +
      (staticCounts.working_papers || 0) +
      (staticCounts.proceedings || 0) +
      (staticCounts.book_chapters || 0) +
      (staticCounts.media_public_writing || 0);

    renderList(matches);
    status.textContent = (matches.length + staticMatchCount) +
      ((matches.length + staticMatchCount) === 1 ? " match" : " matches") +
      " of " + totalSearchable + " total";
  }

  input.addEventListener("input", runFilter);

  fetch("data/published-papers.yml")
    .then(function (response) {
      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error("Failed to load publication data.");
      }
      return response.text();
    })
    .then(function (yamlText) {
      allPapers = jsyaml.load(yamlText) || [];
      allPapers.sort(function (a, b) { return Number(b.order) - Number(a.order); });
      updateCountSummary();
      runFilter();
    })
    .catch(function () {
      listContainer.innerHTML = "<p>Unable to load publication data right now.</p>";
      status.textContent = "";
    });
});
</script>
